fields.summary: OSX Studio Freezes After JavaScript CollapseAll

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI

comments.body:
Thanks for raising this ticket.

It's not clear exactly what you are doing - are you clicking the "Collapse All" button, or clicking on the root of a project? What view are you using; App Explorer or Project Explorer?

Please add the log that is generated, just after you have experienced the problem.

Please read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] before raising any further tickets.

Thank you
btw, edit the ticket to complete the information, rather than adding a comment - thanks.
